answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Jamie - Active Network, Municipal Marketing helps cities/counties develop sponsorships and partnerships as new revenue resources for a variety of events, activities, website design, etc., I think you'll find them very helpful.  Contact: 
Don Schulte
Director of Business Development
Active Network 
Municipal Marketing
Tel 714.374.3330 ext. 5011
Don.Schulte@activenetwork.com
Good luck!
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450
pmuse@transformgov.org

author: Jamie Ludovic
text:
Good morning, I was wondering if anyone has solicited either donations or sponsorships for the creation of a new website? If so, what approach did your community take and what policies were enacted?
Thanks,
Jamie
belongia@ci.montgomery.il.us
title: Donations v. Sponsorships v. Advertising for Websites
